title: Ultimate New Caledonia Le Méridien Luxury: IIe des Pins Stay with Daily Breakfast & Roundtrip International Flights
description:
Castaway to New Caledonia and discover the magic of Nouméa and Ile des Pins on a one-of-a-kind luxury getaway to combine the best of both destinations. Begin your New Caledonian adventure with included flights from select cities in Australia and New Zealand, followed by one night at the beachfront Le Méridien Noumea Resort & Spa. Here, enjoy a lavish stay directly on Anse Vata Bay overlooking a cerulean lagoon that stretches far into the horizon. Enjoy the upscale facilities and amenities before making your own way to the picturesque Le Méridien Ile des Pins, a spectacular and secluded haven just a 45-minute flight away.

Expect to be awe-struck at both resorts as you fill your days enjoying blissful seclusion, snorkelling through crystal-clear waters, unwinding at the serene spa or diving into the palm-lined infinity pool or famed natural swimming pool just a 15-minute stroll from Le Méridien Ile des Pins. Fill your days by savouring French-inspired fare or sampling the flavours of New Caledonia at both resorts, before rounding out your alluring retreat in paradise by returning to Le Méridien Noumea Resort & Spa for one night before travelling home via included flights to select cities.
offer_address: Baie D'Oro Bp 175 Ile Des Pins 98832 New Caledonia

title: French-Style New Caledonia Ocean-View Apartment Escape with Daily Breakfast
description:
Get a taste of French cosmopolitan culture and sparkling ocean views at Hilton Noumea La Promenade Residences, New Caledonia, offering a collection of self-contained apartments in a spectacular beachside location.

Your sophisticated escape includes exclusive dining benefits: daily buffet breakfast, a bottle of French wine with a cheese platter on arrival, and 20% discount at the on-site La Terrasse restaurant and the chic L'Equilibre restaurant at nearby Nouvata Hotel. Plus, enjoy a guaranteed late 5pm checkout, complimentary Wi-Fi during your stay, return airport transfers, and return boat transfers to Hilton Escapade Island Resort, set on an idyllic dot in the ocean surrounded by a 200-hectare marine reserve.

**Travelling with friends or family?** Two and three-bedroom apartment upgrades are available.
offer_address: 109 Prom. Roger Laroque, Nouméa 98807, New Caledonia

title: Ultimate New Caledonia: One Holiday. Two Amazing Locations
description: Bonjour! Get a taste of French cosmopolitan culture at beachside Hilton Nouméa La Promenade Residences then escape to overwater bungalow luxury on the sparkling shores of Escapade Island surrounded by a 200ha marine reserve. Your Escapade Island Resort package includes daily buffet breakfast, nightly buffet dinner and return boat transfers. Hilton Nouméa La Promenade Residences packages include welcome drinks for two, return airport transfers, AU$50 dining credit and 15% off at two restaurants.
offer_address: 109 PROMENADE ROGER LAROQUE, NOUMEA, 98807, NEW CALEDONIA

title: Secluded New Caledonia Paradise with Beachfront Pool, Daily Breakfast, Airport Transfers & Kids Eat Free (Select Packages Only)
description:
Immerse yourself in the serene beauty of New Caledonia with a stay at the luxurious Le Méridien Ile des Pins. Nestled on the pristine Oro Bay of the Isle of Pines, this sanctuary is a haven of tranquillity, surrounded by the island's lush forests and turquoise lagoon. Explore the nearby natural pool, a stunning turquoise basin fringed by towering Araucaria pines, or savour the local flavours at the hotel's La Pirogue restaurant. No matter your vacation style, New Caledonia is the perfect island escape, coupling the charm of French architecture and cuisine with the natural wonder of island life. Unwind in the exquisite infinity pool, or indulge in a rejuvenating treatment at the Deep Nature Spa. This is island luxury at its finest.

Fill each day with a new adventure as you uncover the beauty of the island both above and below the surface. Don your bathers and snorkelling gear and float through the unbelievably clear waters of the lagoons and beaches, watching as the vibrant fish and friendly turtles go about their days. Explore from the sea with a kayaking expedition, before hiking through the dense pine forests that make the island so recognisable.
offer_address: Baie D'Oro Bp 175 Ile Des Pins 98832 New Caledonia
